title: How eBPF is shaping the future of Linux and platform engineering
author: Travis Van
description: eBPF allows users to load and safely run custom programs within the Linux kernel, without requiring direct changes to the kernel itself. The possibilities are endless.
cntitle: eBPF 如何塑造 Linux 和平台工程的未来
cndescription: eBPF 允许用户在 Linux 内核中加载和安全运行自定义程序，而无需直接更改内核本身。可能性是无限的。
